QuestData.Title: Inspiring Ashran
QuestData.Description: I hope you will find our facilities to be up to your high standards.$b$bThis inn is run by Jaesia Rosecheer, in my opinion this is the best place to hearth in Draenor.$b$bWe have new recruits coming through the portal daily. In fact our latest recruit, Knewbie McGreen just came through the portal today.$b$bIf you are looking to trade for weapons or armor, Vindicator Nuurem will be happy to help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Jaesia Rosecheer, Vindicator Nuurem, and Knewbie McGreen.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you again for taking the time to visit, commander. You have no idea how much it means to us.
